Module com.projekt.oop.yourvotematters
Package com.projekt.oop.yourvotematters.controller

Class MainPageController

java.lang.Object
com.projekt.oop.yourvotematters.controller.MainPageController
public class MainPageController extends Object
This class is responsible for handling the user input and updating the view based on the user input. Communicates with the MainPageModel to perform the necessary operations.
Author:
Marek ÄŒederle
